Directly.messsage: Experience the most advanced geospatial data management with Leaflet-Geoman for effortless creation and editing of geospatial data. Directly on the map.

HeaderAbout.messsage: The following items were used for this project:

reactrouter.messsage: React-router-dom library is used for component routing.

context.messsage: Context is used to manage state and dark mode.

i18next.messsage: For the multilingual mode, i18next library is used.

reactleaflet.messsage: The reactleaflet library was used to create an interactive map of components.

SliderExplain.messsage: This project has been implemented for Cando school.

WhichGame.messsage: Which game are you looking for?

footerexplain.messsage: We are at your service from console sales to main game account services to combined and offline accounts.

gameaccount.messsage: Buy the Original account of the game

forsearch.messsage: The material UI library was used for searching.

forSignupin.messsage: Help has been taken from Yup and React-hook-form libraries to verify registration and entry.

forSwiper.messsage: Swiper library is used to run the slider.
